de.lmu.ifi.dbs.jfeaturelib.features

Interface FeatureDescriptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Descriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeatureDescriptor, AdaptiveGridResolution, AutoColorCorrelogram, CEDD, CentroidBoundaryDistance, CentroidFeature, ColorHistogram, Compactness, Eccentricity, ExtremalPoints, FCTH, FuzzyHistogram, FuzzyOpponentHistogram, Gabor, Haralick, Histogram, JCD, JpegCoefficientHistogram, LuminanceLayout, Moments, MPEG7ColorLayout, MPEG7EdgeHistogram, OpponentHistogram, PHOG, PolygonEvolution, Profiles, ReferenceColorSimilarity, Sift, SquareModelShapeMatrix, SURF, Tamura, Thumbnail

    public interface FeatureDescriptor
extends Descriptor
    Interface for a common descriptor that returns a either a single feature vector or a set / list of feature vectors.
    Author:
    graf

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.lmu.ifi.dbs.jfeaturelib.Descriptor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDescription()
      Returns a short plain Text description about the Descriptor and the semantics of the double array obtained from getFeatures().

      Returns the values of the descriptor as a double array.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.lmu.ifi.dbs.jfeaturelib.Descriptor

        addPropertyChangeListener, run, supports

    • Method Detail

      • getFeatures

        List<double[]> getFeatures()
        Returns the values of the descriptor as a double array. The semantics of the according values should be explained in the JavaDocs of the implementing class. If features are not (yet) computed, an empty listis returned.
        Returns:
        list of feature vectors

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Returns a short plain Text description about the Descriptor and the semantics of the double array obtained from getFeatures(). May return null if no description is implemented - even though this should be avoided by any means.
        Returns:
        semantic description of getFeatures or null.

      • setProperties

        void setProperties(LibProperties properties)
                   throws IOException
        Injects the properties class that can be used to retrieve several properties.
        Throws:
        IOException - if something went wrong
